album.title: Hide Away: The Best of Freddie King

track.name: Have You Ever Loved a Woman
comments: Long Live the King!
Yes
Good Crom, my ears just imploded with überjoy.
this IS THE BLUES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
this is when I would be doing my "concert whistle" ......woo!
Call him Rock & Roll Hall Of Famer Freddie King.. Still so many wrongs to right on how they decide who gets in..
Oh yeah Freddie - play it like it is.
he can make that guitar talk
sweet to my ears...
total blues jam----wow---great stuff here maynard
God Damn God, thank you for blessing me with ears to hear
damn god damn
If the anguish  of love could speak, this is what it would sound like.
Another giant of a KING who could sing and play the blues with such power and pioneering effort both as a singer and guitarist!!
This version is best ever, OUTSTANDING-->clap,clap bowing down!
That drowned before the days began
YEP, it´s true
this guy is a "guitar Boogie -Woogie Man "
Freddie just been inducted into the Rock n Roll Hall of Fame by ZZ Top & Joe Bonamassa
I REALLY LIKE THIS SONG!!!!!
